title: MacBook a2289 (820-1987-A) Stuck a 5.17v 0.00a
message: Help please. Customer brought the device in stated it stopped taking charge a week ago. He tried all new chargers. No corrosion on logic board.

title: MacBook a2289 (820-1987-A) Stuck a 5.17v 0.00a
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Machine doesn't charge battery, or doesn't turn on at all?
What is PPBUS_G3H exact voltage?
Also check diode mode to ground on it.

title: MacBook a2289 (820-1987-A) Stuck a 5.17v 0.00a
message:
[QUOTE="Shantiche, post: 101970, member: 56095"]
PPBUS_G3H voltage = 0.01
diode mode = 0.7
[/QUOTE]
0.001*

title: MacBook a2289 (820-1987-A) Stuck a 5.17v 0.00a
message:
No need to specify milivolts; good enough to say 0V (for voltage).

Remove F7000 and check C7050 voltage.
If still 0V, then post U7000 basic voltages; P_IN, AUX_DET, SMC_RST_IN, VDDA/P, SMC_RST*, EN_MVR, A/BMON.

Check diode mode to ground at 3V3_G3H_RTC too.
